item.title: By: Julia
item.dc:creator: Julia
item.description: Hi Anita, thanks for the lovely comments on my blog. Love your passionfruit sorbet. I recently made some passionfruit ice-cream myself (I have been making so many macarons lately I have lots of egg yolks to use up!), but the sorbet sounds deliciously light and refreshing. Very nice!
item.content:encoded: Hi Anita, thanks for the lovely comments on my blog. Love your passionfruit sorbet. I recently made some passionfruit ice-cream myself (I have been making so many macarons lately I have lots of egg yolks to use up!), but the sorbet sounds deliciously light and refreshing. Very nice!

item.title: By: Tartelette
item.dc:creator: Tartelette
item.description: Lucky lucky you! The sorbet looks fantastic!
item.content:encoded: Lucky lucky you! The sorbet looks fantastic!

item.title: By: Sophie
item.dc:creator: Sophie
item.description: Gorgeous sorbet, I haven't seen enough passion fruit recipes, glad to have stumbled upon this one :).
item.content:encoded: Gorgeous sorbet, I haven’t seen enough passion fruit recipes, glad to have stumbled upon this one :).

item.title: By: Adrian
item.dc:creator: Adrian
item.description:
Anita, the sorbet looks delicious! I think I'll try it out sometime. You have a new subscriber too. ;)
Thanks for visiting my blog!
item.content:encoded:
Anita, the sorbet looks delicious! I think I’ll try it out sometime. You have a new subscriber too. ðŸ˜‰

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/passionfruit-sorbet/comment-page-1/#comment-29">lisa (dandysugar)</a>.
Do you mean the passionfruit pulp you can get in a can (that's all I've seen in the supermarket here)? I hope that would work, I don't see why not, you may just have to adjust some of the sugar levels, although I'm sorry I haven't tried that.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to lisa (dandysugar).

Do you mean the passionfruit pulp you can get in a can (that’s all I’ve seen in the supermarket here)? I hope that would work, I don’t see why not, you may just have to adjust some of the sugar levels, although I’m sorry I haven’t tried that.

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: I love passionfruit! I can't get pure passionfruit here in SF, though. I wish! Could concentrate work and be as tasty as your beautiful sorbet looks?? It's mouthwatering!
item.content:encoded: I love passionfruit! I can’t get pure passionfruit here in SF, though. I wish! Could concentrate work and be as tasty as your beautiful sorbet looks?? It’s mouthwatering!

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: Great idea! I would have been itching to do the same. Passionfruit sorbet is so lovely and refreshing! :)
item.content:encoded: Great idea! I would have been itching to do the same. Passionfruit sorbet is so lovely and refreshing! ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Anita
item.dc:creator: Anita
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/passionfruit-sorbet/comment-page-1/#comment-25">Beta Gal</a>.
I haven't tried it with anything else... yet... (I hope to make some lovely lemon sorbet when we get some nice lemons growing). Nick's mum has made lemon sorbet and that's where he got the idea from as he liked it so much. I may have to experiment :)
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Beta Gal.

I haven’t tried it with anything else… yet… (I hope to make some lovely lemon sorbet when we get some nice lemons growing). Nick’s mum has made lemon sorbet and that’s where he got the idea from as he liked it so much. I may have to experiment ðŸ™‚

item.content:encoded: yum! Have you tried this recipe with any other fruit?
